attributes.action: Give us a referendum on the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country voted under Edward Heath to join the European Economic Community (EEC) back in the early seventy's, we was promised this was just an economic community, now we see that it has changed fundamentally from an economic community to an ever growing union with a flag that can and does usurp our mother Parliament. I believe this is or is becoming a single nation called the European Union (EU)and at it's change from a European Economic Community (EEC)to the European Union (EU)we the people of this nation and all the seperate peoples in there individual country's of the European Economic Community (EEC)should have been given the vote through a referendum whether or not to allow this fundamental change to all our sovereignty's throughout the whole of western Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
